titles: The engagement and remonstrance of the City of London, subscribed by 23500 hands.
author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704, attributed name.
notes: Sometimes attributed to Sir Roger L'Estrange.
Demanding the dispersal, within twelve hours, of "all such troups and companies as do not properly belong to the guard of this city," and the release from prison of certain citizens.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
